ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via Sheridan, Brwyn Mawr, Broadway and Foster due to, fire department activity near Sheridan/Berwyn.

Headline: No trains between Garfield and Ashland/63rd
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

Green Line trains will operate from Harlem/Lake to 63rd Cottage Grove ONLY.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

If possible consider the Red Line as a service alternative to the Green Line at this time.

 As a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses are available from Garfield and 63rd/Ashland to provide connecting service through the affected area,

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute near 55th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses temp. rerouted SB: Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and 57th; NB Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove, 55th and Woodlawn: near 55th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 55th/Woodlawn, due to street blockage near 55th/Woodlawn.

Southbound buses will operate via 55th, Ellis and 57th including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove, 55th and Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute near Narragansett/Grand
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses temp rrtd NB via Narragansett, Grand, & Fullerton, SB via Narragansett, Fullerton, Austin, North Ave & Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Narragansett/Grand , due street blockage.


Northbound buses will operate via Narragansett, Grand, and  Fullerton.


Southbound buses will operate via Narragansett, Fullerton, Austin, North Avenue and Ridgeland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
